subScenes.name: 问候还车
subScenes.description: 到达还车点，与工作人员打招呼

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi there! You're back with the rental car?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嗨！你把租的车开回来了？

responses.text: Yeah, I'm returning the car from last week.
responses.text_cn: 是的，我来还上周租的车。

responses.text: Hi! I'd like to return the vehicle, please.
responses.text_cn: 您好，我想办理还车手续。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用简短回应快速进入主题

subScenes.name: 检查车况
subScenes.description: 确认油量和车身损伤情况

qaPairs.speakerText: The tank's about half full—did you refill it?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 油箱大概一半满，你加过油吗？

responses.text: Yeah, I filled it up before returning.
responses.text_cn: 加满了，我回来前加的油。

responses.text: I didn't, but I thought it was okay.
Oops, I forgot—can I pay extra?

qaPairs.usageNote: 如实说明油量情况避免纠纷

qaPairs.speakerText: There's a small scratch on the driver's side door—did you notice that?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 驾驶座门上有道小划痕，你注意到了吗？

responses.text: I'm sorry, I didn't see it when I picked it up.
responses.text_cn: 抱歉，取车时我没注意到。

responses.text: Yeah, that was there already—I checked the report.
responses.text_cn: 取车时就有，我看过检查单了。

responses.text: Oh no, I must've gotten it yesterday.

qaPairs.usageNote: 区分新旧损伤，保留证据

subScenes.name: 交接钥匙与收据
subScenes.description: 归还钥匙并索要还车收据

qaPairs.speakerText: Here's your key—everything looks good on our end.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 这是��的钥匙，我们这边检查没问题。

responses.text: Great! Could I get a receipt, please?
responses.text_cn: 太好了！能给我一张收据吗？

responses.text: Thanks! Do you email it or give paper?
responses.text_cn: 谢谢！是发邮件还是给纸质的？

qaPairs.usageNote: 主动索要收据，保留凭证

subScenes.name: 确认费用与道别
subScenes.description: 确认无额外费用后礼貌道别

qaPairs.speakerText: No extra charges—your card was only charged for the base rate.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 没有额外费用，只扣了基础租金。

responses.text: Perfect! Thanks so much for your help.
responses.text_cn: 太好了！非常感谢你的帮助。

qaPairs.usageNote: 确认无争议后表达感谢

responses.text: Thanks, you too! See you next time!

qaPairs.usageNote: 简短礼貌道别，留下好印象
